channel.title: Hiding ip adress when logging in
channel.description: Hey there, right now you can see the ip adress and the port for my client when logging in, how could i hide this?

item.title: Hiding ip adress when logging in
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Search for “aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c” in the client class and remove these two pieces of code.

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15;

and

            aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "Port:" + port + ((anInt1216 == 3) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "" : ""), j);
            j += 15;

tbh, this is just a cheap way of getting round this, but it should be sufficient.

Read full topic
item.source: Hiding ip adress when logging in
